page.title: 05Halsway Manor Folk Centre
page.content: The Manor is a{unique residential {Folk Centre.}It was bought in 1965 by the{Halsway Manor Society. } Today folk enthusiasts from all over the country enjoy the music and hospitality. Every Friday people arrive and have a meal in the Long Room and then enjoy the evening dancing sessions. The folk weekends are varied, sometimes of song and dance, sometimes with Morris Men with dances old and new, and at other times there are Scottish dance clubs. On occasion there is even sword and clog dancing ! Musicians, landscape painters and ramblers are not forgotten and are welcomed here. To help pay for the Folk Centre, the manor is used during the week by local firms and businesses when they run residential courses.
